trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor base class for Web server controls that are derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList" /> class.
A component editor provides a user interface for editing the properties of a control.
trans-unit.target: Un editor di componenti fornisce un'interfaccia utente per la modifica delle proprietà di un controllo.

trans-unit.source: Component editors are invoked from control designers by using the **Property Builder** menu item from the context menu on the control.
trans-unit.target: Gli editor di componenti vengono richiamati da finestre di progettazione utilizzando il **Generatore proprietà** voce di menu dal menu di scelta rapida del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Component editors that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> class are invoked from designers derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class, and are used to edit the properties of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: Gli editor di componenti che derivano dal <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> classe vengono richiamati dalle finestre di progettazione derivati dal <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> classe e vengono utilizzati per modificare le proprietà di controlli che derivano dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe.

trans-unit.source: For examples of such controls, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: Per esempi di tali controlli, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method displays a component editor for the associated control, if one can be created.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> metodo visualizza un editor di componenti per il controllo associato, se è possibile crearne uno.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A> method returns the index of the initial page to be displayed in the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A> metodo restituisce l'indice della pagina iniziale da visualizzare nell'editor del componente.

trans-unit.source: The index in the array of page control types, of the initial page to display.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor" /> class.

A designer that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class creates a component editor that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> class, when the user selects **Property Builder** from the context menu within the designer.
trans-unit.target: Derivato da una finestra di progettazione di <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> classe crea un editor di componenti che è derivato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> (classe), quando l'utente seleziona **Generatore proprietà** dal menu di scelta rapida nella finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> object that can be used to gain additional context information.
An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> implementing the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />, which represents the component to edit.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window" /> that represents the parent window.
Edits the specified component by using the specified context descriptor and parent window.
<see langword="true" /> the component was successfully edited; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method gets a <xref:System.Type> array of page control types by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> metodo ottiene un <xref:System.Type> matrice di tipi di controllo pagina usando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm> object, and then calls its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A> method to display the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm> oggetto e quindi viene chiamato il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A> metodo per visualizzare l'editor del componente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages" /> method must have been overridden to return a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> array of page control types.
trans-unit.target: Il <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages" /> metodo deve avere stato sottoposto a override per restituire un <see cref="T:System.Type" /> matrice di tipi di controllo pagina.

trans-unit.source: This array must exist in order for the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent" /> method to succeed.
trans-unit.target: La matrice deve essere presente affinché il <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent" /> esito positivo del metodo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the initial page to display in the component editor.
The index of the initial page in the array.
The initial page is specified when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> object is created.
trans-unit.target: La pagina iniziale specificata quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> viene creato l'oggetto.
